original_text: Then you must bring her into your home. She must cut the hair off her head. She must cut her fingernails.
korean_text: 그를 네 집으로 데려갈 것이요 그는 그 머리를 밀고 손톱을 베고

sentences.original_text: Then you must bring her into your home.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 너는 그녀를 네 집으로 데려가야 한다.

sentences.original_text: She must cut the hair off her head.
